items.sentence: I went to Tom\'s room to find out what he was doing.
Mary is Tom\'s oldest child from his third marriage.
Mary said she wouldn\'t do that unless you help her.
I have a lot of things I have to do before tomorrow.
We haven\'t been able to find anyone to replace Tom.
We know that Tom has been shot. That\'s all we know.
Tom was working in Boston the day Mary was murdered.
Tom watched the squirrel jump from branch to branch.
Tom went to Boston, where he stayed for three weeks.
The Jacksons lived in Boston before they moved here.
